card_text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Dimension Dice" from your Deck to your hand. At the start of the Battle Phase: You can activate this effect; each player rolls a six-sided die and applies the result to all monsters they control, until the end of this turn.$N●1: Lose 1000 ATK.$N●2: Gain 1000 ATK.$N●3: Lose 500 ATK.$N●4: Gain 500 ATK.$N●5: Halve their ATK.$N●6: Double their ATK.
